title: OpenRouter Models Sync Tool (Self-Contained)

force_refresh.description: Force refresh even if catalog is less than 24 hours old

models_count.description: Number of models in the catalog

catalog_id.description: ID of the models catalog breadcrumb

examples.explanation: Tool checks if catalog exists and is less than 24 hours old. If so, returns existing catalog without fetching from API.

examples.description: Force refresh regardless of cache age
examples.explanation: With force_refresh=true, tool always fetches latest models from OpenRouter API and updates catalog, ignoring cache age.

ui_schema.description: This tool syncs the OpenRouter models catalog from the public API. No configuration needed - just run it! The catalog is cached for 24 hours.

description: Syncs OpenRouter models catalog from public API and publishes as breadcrumb. This keeps the models list up-to-date for dropdown selections.
